forumNotes.author: DLINUX
forumNotes.content:
Hi all
I try Dvd Multi boot to Win2003 x32 and Win 2003 x64 with Grub4dos mkisofs 2.01 (i686-pc-cygwin)
tree folder: Grub root grldr , menu.lst \\boot I try first test with: copy \\i386 folder Win 2003 x32 adding setupldr.bin patch, creating iso, it work. delete i386 Win 2003 x32
I try second test with: copy \\i386 Win 2003 x64 adding setupldr.bin \\AMD64 creating iso, it work. Final test: adding folder Win 2003 x32, rename NT_0, adding patch setupldr.bin and txtsetup.sif modifing creating iso. Work only Win 2003 x64. When launch Win 2003 x32 with Vmware appears error with number and symbol.
Where is the error? Thanks Regards
z900
